### Taarifa za Utambulisho na idadi ya watu za Kaya na Mkuu wa kaya

bind.jr:constraintMsg: The worker ID must be a number between 0 and 999, 3 digts, and can't start with a zero. / ID ya mfanyakazi lazima iwe kati ya 0 na 999, tarakamu 3, na haiwezi kuanza na sifuri. / O codigo do trabalhador deve ser um numero entre 0 e 999, 3 digitos, e nao pode comecar com zero.
ID must be in this format ABC-123 (only capital letters followed by a '-' and 3 numbers). Hii namba lazima iwe katika muundo wa ABC-123. Este numero deve estar no formato: ABC-123.
Membership can't exceed 20 people. Haiwezi kuzidi 20. Nao pode exceder 20.
This number must be in the format: ABC-123-001. Hii namba lazima iwe katika muundo wa ABC-123-001. Este numero deve estar no formato: ABC-123-001.
Date of birth can't be in the future. Tarehe haiwezi kuwa ya mbeleni. A data introduzida não pode ser no futuro.
Number of months must be less than or equal to 12. / Haiwezi kuzidi miezi 12. / Não pode exceder 12 meses.

The number of months selected must equal the number entered in the previous question / Idadi ya miezi iliyochaguliwa lazima iwe sawa na namba iliyoandikwa swali lililopita. / O numero de meses selecionados deve ser igual ao numero introduzido na pergunta anterior.
Invalid date of birth. Tarehe haiwezi kuwa ya mbeleni au kabla ya mwaka 1919. A data introduzida não pode ser no futuro ou antes do ano 1919.

Must be less than or equal to the total number of members.
Deve ser menos ou igual ao numero total de membros.
Lazima iwe 'chini ya' au 'sawa na' jumla ya idadi ya wangapi wa kaya hii.
Can't exceed 50. Haiwezi kuzidi 50. Não pode exceder 50.

Cannot exceed the total number of people who slept in the household last night. / Haiwezi kuzidi jumla ya idadi ya watu waliolala katika kaya hii jana usiku. / Nao pode exceder o numero total de pessoas que dormiram no agregado na noie passada.

Cannot exceed the total number of people who slept in the household last night. / Haiwezi kuzidi jumla ya idadi ya watu waliolala katika kaya hii jana usiku. / Nao pode exceder o numero total de pessoas que dormiram no agregado na noie passada.

This number has to be equal to the total number of people who slept in the household last night minus sum of the previous two questions. / Namba hii lazima iwe sawa na jumla ya idadi ya watu waliolala katika kaya hii jana usiku ukitoa jumla ya idadi ya maswali mawili yaliotangulia. / Este numero deve ser igual ao numero total de pessoas que dormiram no agrgado na noite passada menos a soma das duas questoes anteriores.

This must be less than or equal to the total number of houses (constructions).
